title: Beautifully design and very peaceful villa - LIP 133
details:
LIP-133 This peaceful, well-appointed house is set in very well-manicured gardens with many tropical and coconut trees with great natural vegetation. The property is walled and gated and boasts ample secure parking as well as generous staff accommodation.
There are 3 large bedrooms with bathrooms and an office area that could be converted to a fourth bedroom. A large, comfortable wrap around verandah completes the living areas. There is a large indoor living room and a very comfortable courtyard area, which can also be used an alternative dining area which overlooks the large infinity pool. The large fitted kitchen is generous in nature and the entire villa has high ceilings and very good woodwork throughout.
